Install CLI

Requirements

  • Windows 10, Mac OSX, Linux
  • Node.js: v12 or higher

Install

Mac (Homebrew)

$ brew install loki-cli

NPM

$ npm install loki-cli

Yarn

$ yarn install loki-cli
